This site hosts the experiments comparing RadViz3D to RadViz2D and Viz3D.

### Visualizations

This page contains a navigation bar on the left for accessing each dataset.

### Instructions for interactive views

The 3D interactive plots are implemented with the `rgl` functions and here are instructions for manipulation:

- Rotation: Click and hold with the left mouse button, then drag the plot to rotate it and gain different perspectives.

- Resize: Zoom in and out with the scroll wheel, or the right mouse button.
